documentation.text: @dev This contract manages a list of whitelisted addresses.

@dev triggered when an address is added to the whitelist
 @param _address address that's added from the whitelist

@dev triggered when an address is removed from the whitelist
 @param _address address that's removed from the whitelist

@dev adds a given address to the whitelist
 @param _address address to add

@dev adds a list of addresses to the whitelist
 @param _addresses addresses to add

@dev removes a given address from the whitelist
 @param _address address to remove

@dev removes a list of addresses from the whitelist
 @param _addresses addresses to remove

attributes.text: @dev This contract manages a list of whitelisted addresses.

@dev triggered when an address is added to the whitelist
 @param _address address that's added from the whitelist

@dev triggered when an address is removed from the whitelist
 @param _address address that's removed from the whitelist

@dev adds a given address to the whitelist
 @param _address address to add

@dev adds a list of addresses to the whitelist
 @param _addresses addresses to add

@dev removes a given address from the whitelist
 @param _address address to remove

@dev removes a list of addresses from the whitelist
 @param _addresses addresses to remove

devdoc.details: This contract manages a list of whitelisted addresses.

AddressAddition(address).details: triggered when an address is added to the whitelist

params._address: address that's added from the whitelist

AddressRemoval(address).details: triggered when an address is removed from the whitelist

params._address: address that's removed from the whitelist

acceptOwnership().details: used by a new owner to accept an ownership transfer

addAddress(address).details: adds a given address to the whitelist

addAddresses(address[]).details: adds a list of addresses to the whitelist

isWhitelisted(address).details: returns true if a given address is whitelisted, false if not

returns._0: true if the address is whitelisted, false if not

removeAddress(address).details: removes a given address from the whitelist

removeAddresses(address[]).details: removes a list of addresses from the whitelist

transferOwnership(address).details: allows transferring the contract ownership the new owner still needs to accept the transfer can only be called by the contract owner
